history.proof: intros a b c H1 H2. hauto lq: on drew: off use: Nat.add_sub_assoc, Nat.sub_add, Nat.add_succ_r, Nat.add_sub, Nat.add_comm.

original: intros a b c H1 H2. rewrite Nat.sub_sub_distr. rewrite Nat.sub_sub_distr. rewrite (Nat.sub_add _ c) by apply H2. rewrite Nat.add_comm. rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc; try apply Nat.le_trans with c; auto.
